data.comment: In the minute -3, Jose de Jesus Corona (Cruz Azul) has been booked during the half time break!
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 2, Necaxa advance rapidly upfield but Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava blows for offside.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Orbelin Pineda. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul are caught offside.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 12, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Cruz Azul are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 16, Julio Cesar Dominguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Necaxa.
Important block from the Necaxa defence as Jonathan Rodriguez fires in a strike for Cruz Azul.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Throw-in for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Necaxa have a dangerous throw-in.
In Mexico City Necaxa drive forward through Lucas Passerini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 34, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Jonathan Rodriguez.
That's a fine assist from Orbelin Pineda.
In the minute 37, Necaxa have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured David Cabrera.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) has taken off David Cabrera who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Maximiliano Salas is the replacement.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 42, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Necaxa are coming forward and Maximiliano Salas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Necaxa, close to Cruz Azul's area.
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In Mexico City, Cruz Azul push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Luis Romo of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 45, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Necaxa.
The first-half has come to a close in Mexico City.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava has blown to start the second-half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Necaxa.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Necaxa throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 49, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Cruz Azul's Rafael Baca is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 51, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Goal! Cruz Azul extend their lead to 2-0 through Julio Cesar Dominguez.
Luis Romo with an assist there.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cruz Azul close to the penalty box.
Ricardo Chavez is booked for the away team.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Cruz Azul have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Goal! Juan Escobar extends Cruz Azul's lead to 3-0.
Luis Romo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 60, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Mexico City.
In the minute 62, In Mexico City, Maximiliano Salas of Necaxa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jose Cobian is replacing Alex Zendejas for the away team.
Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar misses with an attempt on goal.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Maximiliano Salas, who is grimacing with pain.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Jose Martinez replacing Juan Escobar.
In the minute 70, Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) is making a second substitution, with Elias Hernandez replacing Orbelin Pineda.
Alexis Gutierrez is replacing Yoshimar Yotun for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Azteca.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Necaxa's Maximiliano Salas is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 75, Necaxa push upfield but Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava quickly pulls them for offside.
The home team have replaced Santiago Gimenez with Milton Caraglio. This is the fourth substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Cruz Azul make their fifth substitution with Alex Castro replacing Jonathan Rodriguez.
In the minute 77, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Necaxa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 78, Milton Caraglio for Cruz Azul has been booked by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava and receives a first yellow card.
Necaxa are pushing forward but Maximiliano Salas's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Necaxa.
The away team replace Idekel Dominguez with Yerko Leiva.
In the minute 81, Martin Barragan is on a sub for Juan Delgado for Necaxa.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Cruz Azul.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Necaxa.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
